actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide a yearly clothing allowance of $150 to veterans with service-connected blindness.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide a yearly clothing allowance of $150 to veterans with service-connected blindness of the two eyes of 5/200 visual acuity or less. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 362)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide a yearly clothing allowance of $150 to veterans with service-connected blindness.
